input.sentences: iraqi people were killed and i was there to take pictures . this man lost his wife to terrorists .
many people joined forces to join against the terrorists .
all of those wounded and dead were honored and laid to rest .
output.sentences: There were thousands of people attending the march and emotions were running high.
The people had come together to express their sorrow for the loss of their political leader.
Many races were present at this event, for a day everyone forgot their own biases to support one another.
Chants were yelled, banners flew and giant human snake wound it's way through the city.
At the very end of the event the people brought his casket to it's final resting place.
